page.title: 03Wykeham Village
page.content: {Wykeham}is a pleasant village situated on the Scarborough Pickering road, it is 6 and a half miles to the nearest town, Scarborough. It has 5 farms which are of great importance to the community. There are approximately 150 people living in . {Wykeham.}Most people are farm workers, estate workers, retired, housewives or school children, not many people commute. {Wykeham}has a hotel and restaurant, a caravan site, an Abbey and an unusual church, because it's spire is separate from the church itself. There is also a village shop with a post office, and a mobile library comes through{Wykeham}every fortnight. {Wykeham}was mentioned in the original{Domesday Book. {
